snippet.title: LiteBringer - How to Play
snippet.description:
Learn the basics of how to play LiteBringer and start your adventure in the lands of Asirenia. LiteBringer is a true blockchain game, with the whole game taking place in the Litecoin blockchain. Download and more information at https://www.litebringer.com/

0:25 Creating a character and choosing a class
1:16 Completing quests and gathering loot
2:14 Equipping gear and gaining power
3:00 Taking advantage of elemental bonuses
3:53 Collecting elemental stones and upgrading items
5:10 Trading equipment, resources and characters

Subscribe to our newsletter at https://cutt.ly/litebringer-newsletter
Follow us on Twitter at https://twitter.com/litebringergame/
Join us on Discord at https://discord.gg/AfHTqTY
Visit us on Medium at https://medium.com/@Litebringer
Contact us via e-mail to community-management@litebringer.com
